original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks Go to the Movies: Bigger
overview: The fur really flies when rock star wannabes, The Furballs (Alvin, Simon and Theodore), get no respect from big-time record companies because they're just little kids. Alvin wished he were bigger, and his wish comes true big-time when he winds up a hot-shot exec at a hip, happening record company. But when you're bigger, you're too big for such fun things as Little League. This takes a little rethinking ... and a whole lotta reshrinking on Alvin's part. The laughs are big and fast in this spoof of the movie hit that made Tom Hanks big!
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks Go to the Movies: Bigger
